data.text: @ButylinaMaria Hi! Yes you can bring a trolley bag o 55*40*23cm (excluding wheels – max 5cm) OR 80*40*23cm if it is a musical instrument, a 20kg checked in baggage and a carry-on bag 40x30x20cm (placed under the seat). Have a safe flight!

data.text: @zxzxzxzscsc Hi! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.
@_________ris Hi there! Our agents available 24 hours, please reach us via Call Centre or Live Chat and we will assist you.

@KonstantinaVK Hi, please accept our sincere apologies. In this case, you can accept the schedule change, rebook it for free or request 120% WIZZ credits or a 100% original payment refund. The easiest way to request it is under your WIZZ profile.

Amazing news!
WIZZ has joined The Alliance for Zero-Emission Aviation so together we can pave the way for the next generation of sustainable aircraft! https://t.co/YvyL4q6kO0

data.text: @akm450 Hi! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

@paticalamaro Hi there! Wizz Air does not operate connecting flights and cannot facilitate the transfer of passengers or their baggage to other flights (whether operated by Wizz Air or other carriers). For this reason, we cannot accept liability for any missed onward flights.
